name: TinyLegends Monster Crasher
description:
the evil dragon has been AWAKENED. Sound your trumpet as a CALL TO ARMS and get ready for an EPIC challenge.

► ► ► ► ►

An evil dragon was sealed in a cavern by a powerful mage for centuries. But one day it was awakened by a boy who accidentally came upon the cavern and removed the seal. The dragon's going to take vengeance on your kingdom. Thousands of lives are depending on you. And valiant warriors are waiting for your call to eliminate the impending threat once for all.

► ► ► ► ►

• 3D hack-and-slash experience
• A distinct collection of skills and gear
• Heart-stopping boss fights
• Over 8 main storyline quests and 20 side quests
• 3 unique classes
• Powerful class-specific equipment sets
• Collect materials to upgrade gear

► ► ► ► ►
